## Entity Name : Inspector Address 
### Author: Prathap A
### Date: 25/02/2025

#### version : 0001

from pyspark.sql.functions import udf, col, lit, when, coalesce, concat, sum, avg, max, min, count, countDistinct, date_format, to_date, datediff, months_between, year, month,  hour, minute, second, expr, asc, desc
from pyspark.sql.types import DateType, TimestampType, StringType, IntegerType, FloatType, DoubleType, BooleanType, StructType, StructField, ArrayType, MapType
from pyspark.sql.window import Window
from pyspark.sql.functions import row_number, rank, dense_rank, lag, lead, ntile
from pyspark.sql import SQLContext
from pyspark.sql import DataFrame
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.avro.functions import from_avro, to_avro
from pyspark.sql.streaming import DataStreamReader, DataStreamWriter
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql.catalog import Catalog
from pyspark.sql.column import Column
from pyspark.sql.group import GroupedData
from pyspark.sql.pandas.functions import pandas_udf

from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.inspector_address (
    StaffNumber                 STRING,
    StreetandHouseNumber        STRING,
    2ndAddressLine              STRING,
    City                        STRING,
    District                    STRING,
    PostalCode                  STRING,
    RegionStateProvinceCount    STRING,
    StartDate                   DATE,
    EndDate                     DATE,   
    ChartingOfficer             STRING,
    ChartingOfficerforInspector STRING,
    SubsPSgroup                 STRING,
    TelNo                       STRING,
    PersonalMobile              STRING,
    WorkMobile                  STRING,
    Chngdon                     STRING,
    ValHashKey                  STRING
)
USING DELTA

%%sql
SET spark.sql.legacy.timeParserPolicy = LEGACY;

delete from odw_harmonised_db.inspector_address;

-- Insert new data into the table
INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.inspector_address
(
    StaffNumber,
    StreetandHouseNumber,
    2ndAddressLine,
    City,
    District,
    PostalCode,
    RegionStateProvinceCount,
    StartDate,
    EndDate,
    ChartingOfficer,
    ChartingOfficerforInspector,
    SubsPSgroup,
    TelNo,
    PersonalMobile,
    WorkMobile,
    Chngdon,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
)
SELECT 
    StaffNumber,
    StreetandHouseNumber,
    2ndAddressLine,
    City,
    District,
    PostalCode,
    RegionStateProvinceCount,
    
TO_DATE(StartDate, 'M/d/yy') as  StartDate,
TO_DATE(EndDate, 'M/d/yy') as  StartDate,    

    ChartingOfficer,
    ChartingOfficerforInspector,
    SubsPSgroup,
    TelNo,
    PersonalMobile,
    WorkMobile,
   
    TO_DATE(Chngdon, 'M/d/yy') as Chngdon,
    'saphr' as SourceSystemID,
    current_timestamp() as IngestionDate,
    current_date() as ValidTo,
    NULL AS RowID ,
    'Y' as IsActive
FROM odw_standardised_db.inspector_addresses_monthly;

%%sql

UPDATE odw_harmonised_db.inspector_address
SET RowID = md5(
    concat_ws('|',
        StaffNumber,
        StreetandHouseNumber,
        2ndAddressLine,
        City,
        District,
        PostalCode,
        RegionStateProvinceCount,
        StartDate,
        EndDate,
        ChartingOfficer,
        ChartingOfficerforInspector,
        --SubSSPgroup,
        TelNo,
        PersonalMobile,
        WorkMobile,
        Chngdon
    )
